options.content: High-level overview of core tracing system metrics: amount of traces, spans.
Quick overview of main metrics: CPU usage, traces ingestion, flush duration. Use for verifying if spans are ingested by the system.
Overview of main metrics: CPU usage, traces ingestion, flush duration. Use for verifying if spans are ingested by the system.
Backend: storage usage, compaction. Look for any abnormalities in compacting data and retention.
Memory usage and garbage collection from Go perspective.
Potential maintenance issues. Look for increases in queues length, errors, restarts as they may mean resources are underprovisioned.
Writing new spans into storage. Look for gaps or sudden increases in latency.
